title: Basic Reflected XSS - Welcome Message
description: This test demonstrates a simple reflected XSS vulnerability in a greeting message. The user's name is taken from the URL parameters and directly injected into the page without sanitization.
objectives: Identify the reflected XSS vector in the name parameter.
Craft a malicious URL to execute JavaScript code.
Understand the risks of reflecting unsanitized input in user interface elements.
hints: Inject a <script> tag in the name parameter.
Observe how the name is displayed on the page.
Try other event-based payloads such as with onerror.
